episodes.title: Leah Remini EXPOSES Scientology Secrets! | Oz Celebrity
episodes.description:
Leah Remini EXPOSES Scientology Secrets! | Oz Celebrity

In this bombshell episode of Oz Celebrity, Dr. Oz sits down with Leah Remini, actress and former Scientologist, to discuss her explosive memoir, "Troublemaker." Leah reveals the truth about the controversial religion and its impact on her life. Hear the inside scoop on Leah's highly publicized departure from Scientology and the aftermath. Also, Leah shares her personal journey of resilience and how she overcame adversity.

Welcome to the official Dr. Oz YouTube Channel. Please enjoy all the exciting videos that will teach you about health and wellness, including beauty tips, recipes, supplements, happy relationships, smart finances, and much more to live "The Good Life".

episodes.title: Breaking Away from the Children of God, A Wild, Radical Religious Cult | Oz True Crime
episodes.description:
Breaking Away from the Children of God, A Wild, Radical Religious Cult | Oz True Crime

The radical religious cult Children of God was active in over 100 countries with over 10,000 members. The granddaughter of the founder David Berg talks to Dr. Oz about how and why she left the notorious sex cult.

episodes.title: Sex Cult Survivor Speaks Out Against Former Master Allison Mack | Oz True Crime
episodes.description:
Sex Cult Survivor Speaks Out Against Former Master Allison Mack | Oz True Crime

NXIVM leader Keith Rainere is serving 120 years in prison but he was aided in his crimes by many people, including former "Smallville" actress Allison Mack. Dr. Oz speaks to a survivor about her harrowing experience as part of the NXIVM sex cult.
